description: A young man who was http://anidb.net/ch4235 [Shouko]`s boyfriend when he was studying abroad. They went to the same university in Boston. One day he had to leave in order to attend to his parents` funeral, but never came back as he had to stay in Japan to take care of his sister, http://anidb.net/ch4234 [Karada]. Several months later he sent a letter to Shouko that said he would never come back, without explaining the reason.
name: Iokawa Hiro
